sentences.english: Recruiters told them the salaries were very good, but they were asked for money.
sentences.chinese: 招聘者對他們說工資非常不錯，但需要介紹費。

sentences.english: An enthusiastic recruiter can do a lot to sell an organization.
sentences.chinese: 一個熱情的招聘者爲了推銷其公司，會做很多事情。

sentences.english: Hiring is starting to pick up again, recruiters and bankers say.
sentences.chinese: 招聘正在開始再度回暖，招聘者和銀行家們說。

sentences.english: Don't forget to ask for contact information from every recruiter you meet.
sentences.chinese: 不要忘記向你見過的每一位招聘者詢問聯繫信息。
